name: Digital WarRoom
tag_list: e-discovery, compliance, digital-warroom, frcp, eca, early-case-assessment, document-review
overview:
Gallivan Gallivan & O’Melia (GGO) provides software tools and consulting that enable law firms and enterprises to successfully collect, process, review and produce electronically stored information in response to e-discovery requests that result from litigation, government investigations, or other legal challenges.

The Digital Warroom(TM) platform by GGO provides a high performance processing engine and e-discovery review and management tools. With Digital Warroom, law firms, inside counsel, compliance and e-discovery managers have the option to conduct early case assessment, document processing, review, and production in the optimal manner:

  • Digital Warrom PRO for single desktop use
  • Digital Warroom WorkGroup, a multi-user e-discovery system
  • Digital Warroom REMOTE, a full-service hosted platform designed for distributed and virtual team access to case data.

GGO has successfully completed over 1,500 complex e-Discovery matters, including over 150 matters comprising in excess of 40+ TBs of electronic documents in 2008. That experience and breadth of knowledge in processing, hosting and producing such large volumes of data is now at the disposal of law firms and corporations through our Digital WarRoomÂ® Suite of e-discovery tools. Headquartered in Seattle, Washington, GGO, LLC also operates offices in New York, Mountain View, San Francisco, and Dallas, and also serves all metropolitan markets in North America. GGO and the Digital WarRoomÂ® software serves a broad-based of corporations, law firms and government clients, including 20+ Fortune 1000 companies, 30+ AmLaw 100 law firms and agencies such as the Library of Congress.
